title: Stargate - Arc of Truth [PROPER RiP]
description:
Previous rips of this movie were not done properly.. so I downloaded the source DVD ISO [http://thepiratebay.se/tor/4172715/Stargate-The_Arc_of_Truth] and ripped this properly.

DivX5Pro/MP3 are the codecs used. This release will work fine on DivX certified stand-alone DVD players, and the Sony PS3, without any issues.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
